com.dff.cordova.plugin.location

Class LocationPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cordova.CordovaPlugin
      • com.dff.cordova.plugin.common.CommonPlugin
        • com.dff.cordova.plugin.common.service.CommonServicePlugin
          • com.dff.cordova.plugin.location.LocationPlugin

  • public class LocationPlugin
extends CommonServicePlugin
    Cordova Plugin class that deals with the android's Location API, in order to get the location of the device as well as to persist the locations when the app is not reachable.
    Since:
    28.11.2016
